channel.title: Alfred E. Lin
channel.description: Recent content on Alfred E. Lin

item.title: Crowdsourcing Password Webapp
item.description: I developed a quick and dirty shiny web app that allowed users to crowd source usernames and passwords for the Ofo manual lock bikes.

item.title: Map Marker Web App
item.description: A Webapp created from Shiny framework written in R that allows for the user to view/add/delete markers on a map.

item.title: Personal Notes - Quick Nginx
item.description: Another quick post on where all the nginx files and what to change:

item.title: Personal Notes - Quick steps to use Git
item.description: This is just a quick post for me to remind myself how to use git on terminal. Definitely smarter ways to do it, but this is the quick and dirty way without branches etc.

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

item.title: Full Bio
item.description: About me Hi there! My name is Alfred. I’m from Canada, currently living in Singapore!

item.description: This is a chinese test post to show you how chinese is displayed.
